name: Metamorphosis
description:
Based on true story, 'Metamorphosis' presents a metaphorical audio visual journey about presence of time and hope from perspective of a 23 years young man living with walking aids.  Growing up with walking aids/AFO possesses both positive and negative emotions such as disappointment, pity, confidence and comfort and desire to break the boundaries. It's just a matter of time.
--
BGM attribution: Kevin MacLeod - Wisdom In The Sun (Public Domain/No Copyright)
--
CC:
I was a little caterpillar. Shy and weak, not confident and struggling.
A phase has passed and as time goes by I started to believe. Small steps that I made with my walking aids left some memories. I gained the courage to face the world. I started to accept that rocks that I saw were not as big as I had thought. A decade has passed. I am a cocoon now. Stronger than before, collecting faith and hope but still isolated by barriers. Soon or later, time will not come as barrier but as a gift. I believe God will fulfill my wildest dream—to walk normally and to run. It might be the time that I fly like a butterfly.
